title: Trading Confidence Meter
prompt: Create a circular gauge meter showing trading confidence level. Large semi-circular gauge in center with needle pointing to current value. Gauge zones: Red zone (0-40%) labeled 'NO TRADE', Yellow zone (40-60%) labeled 'CAUTION', Green zone (60-100%) labeled 'TRADE'. Current value displayed digitally in center: '78%'. Below gauge: Current regime badge (e.g., 'BULLISH' in green pill). Side panel showing factors: 'Regime Confidence: 85%', 'Kill Zone Active: YES', 'POI Quality: HIGH'. Use dark background (#0F172A) with glowing gauge elements. Modern car dashboard / cockpit instrument aesthetic. Include subtle tick marks and labels around gauge arc.
negative_prompt: flat design, no depth, hard to read numbers, inconsistent lighting, cluttered side panel
